regen.absent_element: automatic switch back to default settings after the end of the current time period
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically switch the power switch back to its default setting at the end of the planned or default time period, unless manually changed again.

regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation after manual switch change
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or confirm to the user when a manual switch change is made to ensure awareness of the appliance's state change.

regen.absent_element: automatic resumption of default settings after manual switch change
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically resume default settings for an appliance's power switch state at the end of the current time period after a manual switch change.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
